name: reaves
description: A Javascript implementation of the Entity-Attribute-Value model and the event sourcing pattern for Node.js

scripts.redis:stop: docker stop reaves; docker rm reaves
scripts.test: npm run redis:start && jest --runInBand; npm run redis:stop
scripts.test:watch: npm run redis:start && jest --runInBand --watch; npm run redis:stop
scripts.test:coverage: npm run redis:start && jest --coverage --runInBand; npm run redis:stop

author: Adriano Di Giovanni <me@adrianodigiovanni.com> (http://adrianodigiovanni.com/)
